issue.title: Apps cannot be moved to SD card (to save device memory)

content.raw:
I mean that, once installed in your device from app store, you cannot move them to the SD card in the apps settings menu.
This was a comment from Daniel, who has few standard memory in his tablet. He must move many apps to the SD card.
But I have tried to do so in other device and I cannot, so I suppose this depends on the device configuration.
So I think we can close this issue.
content.html: I mean that, once installed in your device from app store, you cannot move them to the SD card in the apps settings menu. This was a comment from Daniel, who has few standard memory in his tablet. He must move many apps to the SD card. But I have tried to do so in other device and I cannot, so I suppose this depends on the device configuration. So I think we can close this issue.
